Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repeated code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: There is a repeated pattern of code where the browser version is checked and then the respective alerts are fetched accordingly. This repeated code can be refactored into a separate method which takes alerts and browser versions as parameters and returns the expected alerts.
The series of if-else statements for checking the browser version can be replaced with a switch-case. This will enhance readability and make the code more maintainable.
